sentences: Kuramaal ja Leedu loodeosas elasid kuršid.
Vana-Liivimaa piirkonnas elasid mitmed balti hõimud.
Eestimaal keskajal elasid eesti rahvad oma traditsioonilistel aladel.
context: The word 'elas' is the 3rd person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'elama', which means 'to live' or 'to dwell'. In this context, it refers to where a particular group of people (the kuršid) lived or inhabited in historical times. The word indicates location and existence in the past.
